General_review: Toby's Estate is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Coffee, Desserts, Juices that delivers across Abu Halifa, Al-Qurain, Jabriya, Jahra - Taima and Khairan.
Their best selling dishes are Iced Toby's Latte, 12 Oz Toby's Latte, 6 Oz Flat White and Iced Americano, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Coffee, Desserts, Juices.
They have been reviewed 21478 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.5.

General_review: Melenzane is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Italian, Desserts, Pasta that delivers across Abdullah Al-Mubarak - West Jeleeb, Abdullah Al-Salem, Abu Ftaira, Abu Halifa and Abu Hasaniya.
Their best selling dishes are Milly, Bolognaise, Herbed Fries and Mushroom Ravioli, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Italian, Desserts, Pasta.
They have been reviewed 22459 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.5.

General_review: Asha's is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Indian, Asian, Biryani that delivers across Al Waab, Bneid Al Qar, Jabriya, Mahboula and Oud Metha.

Their best selling dishes are Murg Biryani Awadhi, Murg Makhani (Butter Chicken), Asha For 1 and Aloo Matar Ki Tikki, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Indian, Asian, Biryani.
They have been reviewed 3459 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.5.

General_review: Steak & Fahita Stations is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Sandwiches, Burgers, Shawarma that delivers across Abdullah Al-Mubarak - West Jeleeb, Abdullah Al-Salem, Abu Ftaira, Abu Halifa and Abu Hasaniya.
Their best selling dishes are Chicken Fillet Meal, Chicken Fillet, Fajita Station and Philadelphia, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Sandwiches, Burgers, Shawarma.
They have been reviewed 5759 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.5.

Customer_reviews.review_comment: للاسف الفاهيتا لم تكن بالمستوى المعتاد، و وجبة لذيذة لم تكن لذيذة و الشيبس متكتل و كله زيت

سيء التغليف والجوده وكل شي عبالي تعدلتو طلع اسوء من قبل
الأكل لذيذ ووصلني حار والتغليف رائع والتوصيل بالوقت والسائق جدا محترم شكرا لكم محترم ومؤدب بالتحدث
يا ليت لو تخففون الملح اللي في الشيبس وشكرا

Their best selling dishes are Issa Mame Maki 6 Pieces, Spicy Crab Avocado Salad, Special Prawns Tempura and Crispy Salad, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Sushi, Japanese, Seafood.
